member.name: SHARD
member.summary: Indicates the interpretation of the data passed by in its pv parameter to identify the item whose usage statistics are being tracked.

member.name: SHARD.SHARD_PIDL
member.summary: The pv parameter points to a PIDL that identifies the document's file object. PIDLs that identify non-file objects are not accepted.

member.name: SHARD.SHARD_PATHA
member.summary: The pv parameter points to a null-terminated ANSI string with the path and file name of the object.

member.name: SHARD.SHARD_PATHW
member.summary: The pv parameter points to a null-terminated Unicode string with the path and file name of the object.
